H0.text: Established in 1903, what was Britain's first designated Garden City. Welwyn Garden City

H1.text: Established in 1903, what was Britain's first designated Garden City. Hampstead Garden Suburb

H2.text: Established in 1903, what was Britain's first designated Garden City. Bourneville

H3.text: Established in 1903, what was Britain's first designated Garden City. Letchworth

A4.text: First Garden City Limited was established on 1 September 1903 to purchase the land and begin building the garden city.

A5.text: As the world's first garden city, Letchworth had a notable influence on town planning and the new towns movement in the twentieth century.
